Let God be Consulted. 

     Brethren, shall we educate ourselves to depend upon men rather than to make God our trust and dependence in every emergency? Whatever work 


                     - 35 - 

is attempted with reference to the cause and work of God, we are under obligations to God. Let him be consulted. A few men, whatever office they may hold, should not be mind and judgment for the wide-spreading work all over the large vineyard, which is the world.
